fields.description: Section Header
fields.label: Basic Info

fields.description: Period (Month) in which expense is recognized. Displayed as "YYYY-MM"
fields.label: Month Incurred

fields.description: Type of Expense, selectable mandatorily
fields.label: Expense Type

fields.description: Expense category master
fields.label: Category

fields.description: Expense subcategory (filtered by category)
fields.label: Subcategory

fields.description: Project to which the expense is allocated. Is mandatory ONLY when `Expense Type` = `Project`
fields.label: Project Name

fields.description: Date of Expense, as given by receipt submitted or recognized in line with accounting principles
fields.label: Expense Date

fields.description: Expense amount in currency
fields.label: Expense Amount

fields.description: Currency of expense (typically converted to base currency, INR)
fields.label: Currency

fields.description: Section Break
fields.label: Expense Classification Info

fields.description: Payee using Supplier DocType of core module
fields.label: Supplier

fields.description: Whether the expense is for reimbursement
fields.label: Is Reimbursement

fields.description: Section Break
fields.label: Payment Info

fields.description: Status of expense, with default of `Pending`
fields.label: Expense Status
fields.options:
Pending
Paid
Overdue
On Hold
Cancelled

fields.description: Date of actual payment of expense evidenced by `Mode of Payment`
fields.label: Actual Payment Date

fields.description: How expense was paid using `Mode of Payment` core module
fields.label: Mode of Payment

fields.description: Reference No used for proof/reconciliation such as Supplier Invoice bill number or PO number of company
fields.label: Reference No

fields.description: Date on the Reference info
fields.label: Reference Date

fields.description: Section Break
fields.label: Notes / Files

fields.description: Notes in free-form
fields.label: Notes

fields.description: Evidence attached for expense
fields.label: Attachment

fields.description: Dimensions for cost allocation and reporting
fields.label: Cost Allocation Dimensions
